author: sky.cactus
content: If I am serializing a container with SSZ and the first item in the container is a fixed size uint8, will the first byte of the serialized output be that item?

author: sky.cactus
content: If so, is `ssz(5, <some other stuff>)` the same as `5 || ssz(<some other stuff>)`?

author: protolambda
content: What are you serializing? And what library do you use?

author: sky.cactus
content: I am not using any library.  I am writing an ETH1 specification and considering SSZ for serialization of some data.
